SEARCH
Package com.example.teamalfred.database

Class DatabaseConnection

java.lang.Object
com.example.teamalfred.database.DatabaseConnection
public class DatabaseConnection extends Object
Provides access to a singleton database Connection instance for an SQLite database.

This class uses the Singleton design pattern. By default, it connects to "jdbc:sqlite:database.db". For testing, a different URL (like an in-memory DB) can be specified using setTestDatabaseUrl(String).

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • setDatabaseUrl

      public static void setDatabaseUrl(String newUrl)
      Sets the default database URL for new connections. Closes any existing connection to ensure the new URL is used on the next call to getInstance() if no test URL is set.
      Parameters:
      newUrl - The new default database URL string (e.g., "jdbc:sqlite:another_database.db").

    • setTestDatabaseUrl

      public static void setTestDatabaseUrl(String url)
      Sets a specific database URL to be used for the connection, typically for testing. This URL will be used the next time getInstance() needs to establish or re-establish a connection. Closes any existing connection to ensure the new URL is used on the next getInstance() call. Setting this to null reverts to the default URL for subsequent connections.

      IMPORTANT: Call this BEFORE calling getInstance() in your test setup.

      Parameters:
      url - The database URL string (e.g., "jdbc:sqlite::memory:") or null to use default.

    • getInstance

      public static Connection getInstance() throws SQLException
      Retrieves the singleton database Connection instance.

      Connects using the URL specified by setTestDatabaseUrl(String) if set, otherwise uses the default URL ("jdbc:sqlite:database.db"). If the instance is null or closed, it attempts to establish a new connection.

      Returns:
      The singleton Connection instance.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs during connection.

    • closeInstance

      public static void closeInstance()
      Closes the singleton database connection instance if it's open and not null. Sets the internal instance variable and active URL to null.

    • resetForTesting

      public static void resetForTesting()
      Resets the DatabaseConnection for testing. Closes any existing connection and removes the test database URL override. Subsequent calls to getInstance() will use the default URL unless setTestDatabaseUrl is called again.
